text: thumb Regina Pinkert (1869–1931) was a Polish opera singer and soprano.(February 1907). Regina Pinkert - The Polish Patti, The Theatre, Vol. 7, No. 72(15 January 1908). Greatest Operatic Artists of the World, Talking Machine World, p. 35(May 1907). Our Portraits, Burr McIntosh MonthlyPoriss, Hilary Changing the Score: Arias, Prima Donnas, and the Authority of Performance, p. 138 (Oxford University Press 2009) (reference to 1894 performance) She first came to attention in the United States when appearing at the Metropolitan Opera House for the 1906-07 season.Lahee, Henry Charles. The Grand Opera Singers of To-day, pp. 141-42 (1912) ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1931 deaths Category:Polish sopranos Category:Polish female singers Category:20th-century opera singers Category:20th-century women opera singers Category:Polish operatic sopranos
title: Regina Pinkert
